specialAbilities.name: Pain Fulled
specialAbilities.description: While this model has 1 or more damage on it, it gains [+1] Mobility, and its melee attacks gain Unstoppable(1) and [+1] Rating.

actions.name: Come Hither
actions.description: Move the target 3" toward this model per success.

actions.name: Deadly Flourish
actions.description: This action can only be used if this model did not begin their activation engaged. Move this model up to 3" in a straight line. This model may move through, but not end on, enemy models during this move. After this movement this model may perform a [1] RATING melee attack on each enemy it passed through.

actions.name: Crescent Hook
actions.description: After this attack is resolved, any enemies targeted by this attack may be forced up to 2" toward this model.

actions.name: Thunderfist Slam
actions.description: This attack targets all enemies in range./nSuppression(1): Replace (1)MAGIC on the defender’s chart with STRIKE.

specialAbilities.name: Enlightenment(1)
specialAbilities.description: When this model activates, it may choose up to (1) Offensive Insights within range and apply its effect. Models activating in a combined activation must choose the same Offensive Insight. When this model is attacked, after results are generated, it may choose up to (1) Defensive Insights within range and apply their effects.

specialAbilities.name: Against All Odds
specialAbilities.description:
While this model is in contact with 2 or more enemies, it gains Ward(1).
Ward(1):Replace the lowest STRIKE result on this model's defensive chart with MAGIC

actions.name: Trident Strike
actions.description: Resonating Echo: If this attack generates a hit, the target, and all enemies within 2" of the target, gain Resonate.

actions.name: Gelatinous Shift
actions.description: This attack targets all Resonated enemies in range. On a success, expend Resonate from that enemy and deal them 1 damage. After resolving attacks, place this model anywhere within 3", and then place all targeted enemies in contact.

specialAbilities.name: Iron Will
specialAbilities.description: When targeted by a Will Attack, this model has [+2]WILLPOWER.

actions.name: Sword Strike
actions.description:
Sundering(1): Replace (1)ARMOR on the defender’s chart with 1 STRIKE.
Unrelenting(1): Replace (1)PARRY on the defender’s chart with 1 STRIKE.

actions.name: Clear a Path
actions.description: Enemies within 2" of this model are forced 3" away, in the order of this model’s choosing. This model may then move up to 4" and perform 1 of its melee attacks.
